Owlhawk:  Each side agrees to send in a pre set either
number or percent of warriors and they hold a battle
to the first damage rather than death to determine who
goes and who stays.

He hoped his complete guess lucked out.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Katya was pleased. He seemed to catch things up
> pretty fast, which 
> usually wasn't the case with even Inner Sphere
> warriors they'd 
> captured.
> 
> Katya: Good! Let us continue then. The Clans have
> developped another 
> system that minimizes losses and promotes honor. It
> is our bidding 
> ritual. Without any clue, can you guess what it is,
> quineg?
> 
>
